name: Amigo Pancho Kids
description:
SPECIAL EDITION FOR KIDS CATEGORY!
Hey amigos, are you ready for the incredible adventures?
OVER 90 MILLIONS PLAYS on Web for 3 years!

The game is TOTALLY ADAPTED for children:
* All locations and levels are OPEN
* Special SUPPORT at walkthrough levels (24 hours/7 days a week)
* If you cannot find a solution for the level, JUST use Super Pancho (INFINITE and FREE) and go to the next level
* No external links
* No Advertising
* No In-App purchases

Meet AMIGO PANCHO!
Pancho loves going to the highest places in the world! And he does it in an unusual way: by holding on to two small balloons. What interesting is waiting for you in the game?

- SPECIAL SUPPORT SERVICE - 24/7 (ONLY FOR KIDS VERSION)
If you want to learn how to solve the level, just email (pancho-kids@qaibo.com) and we will send you a solution to this level.

- 5 LOCATIONS (TEXAS, SIBERIA, TIBET, PERU, ARCTIC) AND 100 LEVELS
NEW levels coming soon!!!

- INTERACTIVE PHYSICS GAMEPLAY
Erase, rotate, blow, burst, move and think. Perform all these actions to help Pancho going higher and higher. But be warning! The game is very addictive!

- FREE WARDROBE
Many items and funny costumes in Wardrobe for FREE

***** WORLD REVIEWS *****
"5-star - a fun, challenging game for all brainy kids ages 9 and above" (TOP-KIDS-APPS)
"Fun and awesome game!" (on Nickelodeon: Addictinggames.com)
"9.5/10" (Gamezebo.com)
"Highly Addictive…Very fun with a topping of challenge" (on Newgrounds.com)
"Amazingly, almost every level introduces a new concept" (TouchArcade.com)

WHAT are you waiting for!? Let's FLY to the TOP!

For wishes or bug reports, please write: amigo-pancho@qaibo.com
For more information or support, please visit www.qaibo.com
